head_block_description: Professional accounting service. We work throughout Poland
about_block_description: Finance Expert offers comprehensive accounting services as well as HR and consulting services for companies. Our employees have appropriate experience and training in the field of their qualifications so that you are not afraid to trust them and commission accounting without fear. We constantly observe the changing market and the law, which is why the solutions we propose and our accounting are always compliant with applicable standards and the most beneficial for the client. We also provide our services remotely - cooperation with clients from all over Poland.
offer_card_first_description: We provide comprehensive services for companies and companies from every industry, regardless of the scale and nature of your business. Outsourcing of accounting services offered by our accounting office means measurable benefits for your business.
offer_card_second_description: We offer you a full range of outsourcing of payroll and HR services, from support in hiring an employee, preparation of documents and ongoing HR services, through payroll calculation, to the final settlement of payroll and reporting.
offer_card_third_description: Preparation of financial statements of companies, also taking into account current regulations dictated by changes in regulations, such as e-statements and JPK_SF files. We also improve the area of ​reporting and management information of your company.
offer_card_fourth_description: The scope of our services includes assistance in setting up a company, from legal and tax advice to registration. Our support is not limited only to the preparation of documents, but is primarily a substantive conversation about your needs and presentation of the possibilities that a given legal form of business offers.
offer_card_fifth_description: By choosing our help in updating the company's data in the National Court Register, you can count on full support and completion of the necessary updating formalities (e.g. change of the company's registered office, change of the company's address, change of shareholders' details, change of the company's name, etc.).
offer_card_sixth_description: We participate in the control proceedings conducted by the tax authorities regarding the period of keeping the taxpayer's books by Finance Expert and relating to these activities.
contact_block_title: Remote accounting service for your company
pop_up_privacy_title: This site uses cookies to provide services at the highest level. By continuing to use the site, you agree to their use.

price_first_title: Financial and accounting services - Full accounting
price_first_item_title: Payroll service (preparation of payroll, preparation of earnings certificates, ZUS settlement declarations)
price_first_item_price: 50 zł employee / contractor / other contract / month
price_second_item_title: HR and payroll services (payroll service + leave records, keeping personal files, records of sick leaves)
price_second_item_price: 75 zł employee / contractor / other contract / month
price_third_item_title: Employment of an employee/contractor/other contract (preparation of documentation related to employment)
price_fourth_item_title: Dismissal of an employee (preparation of documentation related to dismissal)
price_block_fourth_item_second_descripti: Preparation and sending of declarations of people running JDG and partners of companies
price_block_fourth_item_third_descriptio: The customer can provide the accounting policy himself
price_block_fourth_item_fifth_price: One average monthly remuneration for financial and accounting services as well as HR and payroll services from a given accounting year, however, not less than PLN 1,000.00
